content:
I think you're good to go! Your revised Facebook post is concise, informative, and visually appealing, with a clear call-to-action to check out the blog post. The additional hashtags will help you reach a wider audience interested in design principles, graphic design, UX design, and design inspiration.

Your revised Instagram post is also great! The series of images will help to break down the importance of typography in design in a visually appealing way, and the additional visuals will make the series more comprehensive. The use of "From readability to emotional response, typography plays a crucial role in design" as a caption will help to provide context and encourage users to swipe through the series.

Remember to track your analytics to see how your posts perform, and adjust your strategy accordingly. You may want to experiment with different hashtags, visuals, or captions to see what resonates best with your audience.

Also, don't forget to engage with your audience by responding to comments and direct messages. This will help to build a community around your brand and increase engagement with your content.

Good luck with your social media campaign!
